tagline: Itineraries that balance must-see moments with room to wander
pros: Day-by-day itineraries with logical routing and realistic timing
Pre-departure checklists catch visa, vaccine, and document deadlines
60/40 planning ratio prevents both over- and under-scheduling
Culturally informed recommendations beyond tourist traps
cons: Recommends and plans but doesn't book directly
General travel — adventure-specific trips need the Outdoor Planner
Can't replace local guides for truly deep cultural experiences

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
